title: Scaffolding-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Digital Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pedagogy and understanding of Bloom's taxonomy
context.additional_context: Conducting case analysis and practical training centered on science curricula to enable pre-service teachers to experience effective learning design in digital environments

learning_goals: Designing digital learning environments with scaffolding approaches through 3 stages (analysis-design-development)
Explaining 6 or more types of digital learning activities based on the revised Bloom's taxonomy
Producing at least one blended learning module tailored to science curricula and receiving peer evaluations

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
